## HTTPErrorXMetadata type

Metadata type for HTTP errors. Provides context about the HTTP request that failed.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type HTTPErrorXMetadata = {
    endpoint?: string;
    method?: string;
    [key: string]: unknown;
};
```
